abilities.name: Mea Culpa
abilities.description: Splash (self): Remove one negative token from all allies in range and place them on this unit. Then remove one, (4+) two, or (6+) all negative tokens from this unit, and gain 1 strength for each negative token removed this way.

abilities.name: Holy Water
abilities.description: Effect: 1 holy damage and (4+) create a hazard under target.

abilities.name: Excoriate
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage, and Stance (Odd): Splash (self): 1 holy damage. (Even): gain 1 vitality.

upgrades.name: Holy Blood
upgrades.description: Mea Culpa creates one or (4+) two hazards in free adjacent spaces.

upgrades.name: Eager
upgrades.description: May step 2 before using Mea Culpa

abilities.name: Gentleness
abilities.description: Effect: Become unable to MOVE, step, or be pushed or pulled until start of this unitâ€™s next turn. At the start of that turn, allied units adjacent to this unit gain 1 vitality.

abilities.name: Delay Judgement
abilities.description: Effect: An allied unit in range gains miracle. If it already had miracle, miracle triggers on a 2+ until the end of their next turn. At the end of that unit's turn, they lose miracle.

abilities.name: Blessed Censer
abilities.description: Effect: Splash (self): Stance (Even): Allies gain 1 vitality. (Odd): foes take 1 holy damage.

upgrades.name: Cleansing Prayer
upgrades.description: Self and adjacent units are curseproof during gentleness.

upgrades.name: Consecrate
upgrades.description: Blessed Censer may remove corpses in range.

upgrades.name: Boiling Censer
upgrades.description: Stance (Round 4+): Blessed Censer's effects trigger twice

abilities.name: Smite
abilities.description: Stance: The next use of Whirling Chain deals +damage equal to half the round number, rounded up and this unit may also step that many spaces before using it.

abilities.name: Whirling Chain
abilities.description: On hit: 2 damage. Stance (Odd): and MOVE again, Stance (Even): and push unit 2

upgrades.name: Punisher
upgrades.description: Stance: Whirling chain obliterates foes it slays at round 3+

upgrades.name: Suffuse
upgrades.description: Whirling Chain gains effect (5+): gain 1 vitality and remove a negative token from this unit.

upgrades.name: Fiery Chain
upgrades.description: Whirling chain creates a hazard adjacent to its target after it resolves

abilities.name: Winch
abilities.description: Effect: Step 1. Next attack from this unit gains +1D and +2 maximum range. This effect stacks.

abilities.name: Requiesce en Pace
abilities.description: On hit: 2 damage. Stance (Round 3+): ignoring armor. (Round 5+): 4 damage, ignoring armor.

upgrades.name: Focus
upgrades.description: If this unit does not move during its turn, it may remove a negative token from itself.

upgrades.name: Heart Destroyer
upgrades.description: Stance: Requiesce en Pace obliterates units it slays at round 3+.

upgrades.name: Explosive Bolts
upgrades.description: Stance: Requiesce en Pace pushes units one, (Round 3+) two, or (Round 5+) four spaces.

traits.name: Flight
traits.description: Ignores adverse terrain and elevation attack and movement penalties

traits.name: Miraculous flesh
traits.description: Lacks miracle, but starts combat with 4 vitality tokens.

abilities.name: Bolides
abilities.description: Effect: Create one, (3+) two, (5+) or three hazards in range, ignoring line of sight.

abilities.name: Indignation
abilities.description: Effect: Remove one or two vitality tokens on this unit, then deal 1 holy damage to that many units in range, and push those units 1.

abilities.name: Ablutions
abilities.description: Effect: Gain two vitality. Until the start of this unit's next turn, adjacent allies may spend vitality tokens on this unit as if they were their own.

upgrades.name: Scathe
upgrades.description: Hazards from Bolides can be created under units.

upgrades.name: Holy Font
upgrades.description: Ablutions gains stance (round 3+): gain 3 vitality instead, (round 5+): gain 4 vitality instead.

upgrades.name: Witness
upgrades.description: Indignation gains stance (round 4+): deal 2 holy damage instead.

traits.name: Holy Vessel
traits.description: Lacks Miracle. However, while alive, miracle triggers for adjacent allies on a 4+, and gain 1 SOUL the first time it triggers in a round.

abilities.name: Starmetal Godsword
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage. Stance (Odd): and step 2, Stance (Even): and gain 1 vitality, Stance (Round 5+): Increase damage to 3

soulAbilities.name: Absolution
soulAbilities.description: Trigger: Turn start. Effect: Self takes 1 damage, ignoring armor. One allied unit in range gains one, (3+) two, or (5+) three vitality.

soulAbilities.name: Will of God
soulAbilities.description: Trigger: Turn start. Effect: For this turn only, self or allied unit in range may treat the current round number as either 2 or 5.

upgrade.name: Winter Rose Stance
upgrade.description: Stance: (Round 3+): Attacks cannot miss (all misses turn into hits).

upgrade.name: Corpse Violet Stance
upgrade.description: Stance: (Round 3+): Gain either physical or magical armor (choose).

upgrade.name: Grand Oath
upgrade.description: Effect: Splash (self). Self and allies in the area may convert any number of vitality to strength.

upgrade.name: Redempta
upgrade.description: Effect: Remove all negative tokens on an ally, then transfer to self. That ally gains 1 vitality per negative token removed and becomes curseproof until the start of its next turn.

upgrade.name: Communion
upgrade.description: Effect: Until end of next turn, self and adjacent allies may spend this unit's hp as if it were vitality tokens.

upgrade.name: Decree of Forbiddance
upgrade.description: Effect: Until end of next turn, foes ending their turn in range 2 of this unit have a hazard created under them, then are pushed 1.

upgrade.name: Holy Water Flail
upgrade.description: On hit: 1 holy damage and splash (target): 1 holy damage. Stance (Round 3+): and create a hazard under target (round 5+) all targets in the area.

upgrade.name: Relic Lance
upgrade.description: On hit: 2 damage. Stance: May step spaces equal to the round number with free movement, in a straight line, before the attack. On hit, push target half that many spaces.

upgrade.name: Starmetal Shuriken
upgrade.description: On hit: 1 damage. Stance: Roll the effect die. If you roll under the round number, deal 1 holy damage again. If you roll exactly the round number, deal 2 holy damage again instead.

upgrade.name: Sword Art: Drifting Blossoms
upgrade.description: Trigger: A unit MOVEs, and that move resolves. Effect: Stance: Step spaces equal to the round number, then push an adjacent unit 1.

upgrade.name: Sword Art: Safflower cut
upgrade.description: Line, Stance: Step 1, then cut a line area with spaces equal to the round number +2, dealing 1 damage to all characters within and pushing those characters 1. Stance (R5+): This damage becomes Devil Damage.

upgrade.name: Grace
upgrade.description: Trigger: Turn start. Effect: Unit becomes curseproof until end of its next turn and attacks against it gain -1D for the duration.

upgrade.name: Sword Art: Winter Sprout
upgrade.description: Trigger: This unit takes damage from an ACT ability, and that ability resolves. Effect: Splash (self): remove 1 negative token on self or gain 1 vitality for every foe in the splash area. Stance (R4+): both effects trigger.

upgrade.name: Supreme Sword Art: Merciful Snowdrop Cut
upgrade.description: Effect: Splash (self): 1 holy damage. Stance (R3+): 2 holy damage (R5+): 3 holy damage. (R6+): 4 holy damage.

upgrade.name: Resurrection
upgrade.description: Trigger: Allied unit is slain. Effect: Return unit to life at 1 hp at the end of the turn. It becomes immune to all damage and curseproof until the start of its next turn. Stance (R3+) and it gains 1 vitality (R5+) 3 vitality instead.
